page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I awake in a morning at 7:00,I just doze for a few mins then I get up and get dressed At 7:30 go through to the kitchen for breakfast a bacon sandwich and tea.At 7:50 I get washed,prepare all my things for the day.8:15 I go to my room,make my bed and read until 8:30.At 8:30 I go to the bus stop where I meet a friend We reach school at about 8:50.Where I meet more of my friends and talk until the bell goes for registration.During lesson time we sit at our desk and the teacher gives us a lecture.We write about it.We have an hour for lunch we eat our dinner. 3:45 school ends and I go home by bus. I reach home at 4:10,I rest watching T.V until 5:00 when I do my hours homework.Then my tea is ready.After my meal I either go out to play or watch T.V. 9:00 I go to bed,read and go to sleep.
